titleStmt.title: A sermon of confirmation preached in Oxford, at the first visitation of the right reuerend Father in God, Iohn Lord Bishop of Oxford. September, 27. 1619. By Edward Boughen, chaplaine to the Lord Bishop of Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Boughen, Edward, 1587?-1660?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bernard Alsop, for Elizabeth Adams, and are to be sold at her shop, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
